seo.title: Portfolio of Tomás Damianovich - Senior Frontend Engineer
seo.description: Portfolio of Tomás Damianovich, Senior Frontend Software Engineer specialized in React, TypeScript, and web development.

goToTop.title: Back to top
goToTop.ariaLabel: Button to scroll back to the top of the page

about.title: About me
about.content: I’m passionate about building efficient, accessible, and scalable web experiences using React and TypeScript. I currently develop travel, hotel, and package booking platforms with Vite and SSR, focusing on SEO and accessibility, including screen readers. I have also worked on creating Node middlewares and robust testing with Jest and React Testing Library. My day-to-day includes supporting and mentoring more junior teammates, always striving for clean, maintainable, and user-centered solutions.

items.subtitle: Senior Developer (React)
items.content: I am part of a Frontend team as a consultant on a Travel platform for a major Spanish group, mainly developing with React, TypeScript, Jest, React Testing Library, Styled Components, Storybook, and Node for SSR. I also participated in creating Node middlewares. I use libraries like React Query and tools like Vite and Webpack. I work under SCRUM methodology and manage tasks with JIRA.
items.title: Capitole Consulting

items.subtitle: Senior Developer - Technical Lead (React)
items.content: I was part of a Frontend team in the largest eCommerce platform in Latin America, starting as Senior Developer and later as Acting Tech-Lead, performing peer follow-ups, technical interviews, and advising on planning to non-technical verticals. We used React, TypeScript, Jest, React Testing Library, SASS, Storybook, Next-like tools, and Material UI. SCRUM methodology and task management with JIRA.
items.title: MercadoLibre

items.subtitle: Semi-Senior Developer (React)
items.content: I was part of a Frontend team on a platform connecting influencers and brands. Development with React, TypeScript, Jest, React Testing Library, SASS, Context API, Bootstrap, and backend consumption with Django (Python). Remote work between Argentina and the USA, using written and spoken English.
items.title: Cohley

items.subtitle: Semi-Senior Developer (React)
items.content: I participated in the development of a client management and support platform for a major Mexican Telecom Group. Using React, TypeScript, Jest, React Testing Library, Formik, Material UI, Context API, and backend consumption with microservices. SCRUM methodology and task management with JIRA.
items.title: GlobalLogic

items.subtitle: Junior Developer (Vue)
items.content: I was part of the Frontend team responsible for the company's Institutional Portal, using Vue JS, Jest, React Testing Library, Material UI, and Redux. Agile methodology (SCRUM) with a distributed team between Argentina and the USA, using written and spoken English for daily communication. Task management with JIRA.
items.title: Accenture

items.subtitle: Junior Developer (Web UI)
items.content: I started with a 6-month internship and later obtained a position in the Systems department of Vialidad for driver license management. Frontend development with jQuery, CSS, Ajax, and MySQL, and backend with PHP (Symfony), including database administration for queries and updates.
